aereo_page.meta_descripcion: cslogix offers fast, safe, and reliable international air transport for your imports and exports.
aereo_page.subtitulo: Reduce transit times with air service
aereo_page.garantia: cslogix guarantees competent, fast, and precise management.
aereo_page.parrafo_pregunta: Do you need to move your goods as soon as possible?
aereo_page.parrafo_respuesta: We offer the perfect solution with our flexible and reliable air service. We take care of the entire process from the main airports in Mexico, meeting the needs and requirements of our clients in their export and import operations.
aereo_page.boton_cotizar: Get a quote for your container
aereo_page.frase_final: Our attention and rates make the difference in your company!

maritimo_page.meta_descripcion: cslogix offers logistics solutions in maritime transport with global coverage and competitive rates.
maritimo_page.garantia: With cslogix we transport your goods to major ports worldwide
maritimo_page.parrafo_pregunta: Are you planning to expand your company and start exporting or importing large loads?
maritimo_page.parrafo_respuesta: We provide high-level solutions by transporting your goods across five continents at competitive rates. Through maritime transport, we ship all types of containers (dry, reefer, open top, flat rack, open side, etc.) to and from any port in the world (export and import) with flexible and secure service from start to finish of your shipment.
maritimo_page.boton_cotizar: Get a quote for your container
maritimo_page.frase_final: With cslogix technology, you’ll be informed in real time, giving you peace of mind!

terrestre_page.meta_descripcion: cslogix provides efficient international and domestic land transport solutions for your goods.
terrestre_page.subtitulo: Save on shipping costs with land service
terrestre_page.garantia: We perform any land movement inside and outside of Mexico.
terrestre_page.parrafo_pregunta: Looking for versatility to transport your goods?
terrestre_page.parrafo_respuesta: cslogix is the ideal transport option for any size and volume of goods; we deliver with traceability, punctuality, and reliability. We guarantee safe and effective transportation, considering all influencing factors to offer economical, fast, and efficient solutions for all our clients.
terrestre_page.frase_final: We are trained to transport, distribute, and deliver your goods with confidence and peace of mind!

blog_page.meta_descripcion: Don't miss the latest in international trade and logistics
blog_page.titulo_principal: We connect you with the world!

contacto_page.meta_descripcion: Get in touch with cslogix for international logistics consulting and customs management.
contacto_page.error_campos_vacios: Please complete all fields to submit the form.
contacto_page.alerta_error: There was an error sending the message

home_page.meta_descripcion: cslogix offers innovative solutions for import, export, and international transport with competitive rates and real-time technology.
home_page.portada_subtitulo_1: We support exporting and importing companies with
home_page.portada_subtitulo_2: logistics and customs management solutions for international trade.
home_page.servicios_subtitulo: We are a business support ecosystem that adapts to you and your needs.
home_page.servicios_parrafo: We help by offering you competitive rates and selecting the best route and transport, reducing your shipping costs.
home_page.control_titulo: With cslogix, take control of your Logistics Chain
home_page.control_subtitulo: It consists of 5 areas to support your efficient management:
home_page.tecnologia_subtitulo: Visibility across your logistics chain with just one click
home_page.tecnologia_parrafo: cslogix keeps you informed about document validation, departures, and deliveries of your goods in real time.
home_page.tecnologia_lista_1: Digital Platform for Intercommunication with all stakeholders in each operation.
home_page.tecnologia_lista_2: App for operation tracking and customs clearance.
home_page.beneficios_subtitulo: Explore each of the three real-time tracking systems we offer your company.
home_page.beneficios_parrafo: Thanks to its technology, cslogix lets you track your goods for greater security, improves communication with your suppliers, and saves you time.
home_page.mundo_titulo: We Reach Every Part of the World
home_page.mundo_subtitulo: We have a network of partners in America, Europe, and Asia
home_page.mundo_lista_1: We are ready to deliver your goods with trained personnel to optimize your costs and delivery times.

nosotros_page.meta_descripcion: Learn about the history, mission, and values of cslogix, experts in international logistics solutions.
nosotros_page.subtitulo: Growth and innovation for the control of your international logistics chain
nosotros_page.parrafo_compromiso: Our commitment is to support companies engaged in international trade by providing logistics and customs management solutions to strengthen, secure, and facilitate import and export operations efficiently and smoothly.
nosotros_page.mision_texto: cslogix is a company committed to supporting strategies and providing efficient solutions in every international trade logistics operation with cutting-edge technology, profitability, and continuous improvement.
nosotros_page.vision_texto: By 2025, we will be one of the top 5 private organizations providing comprehensive support for international trade operations, meeting our clients’ expectations.
nosotros_page.gestion_parrafo: Our formula for success includes the constant development of flexible and client-specific distribution solutions at competitive prices. With global reach and the personalized support of our team, we build strong relationships based on service quality and the latest information technology.
nosotros_page.gestion_boton: Get a quote for your shipment now
